message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on something really valuable. I'm willing to sell it to you for $90.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $80. Can you meet me at that price?

I understand you're looking to get a good deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can sell the product to you for $85. It's a great price, and I think you'll really appreciate the value it brings.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my target budget. Would you be willing to go down to $82?

I understand you're trying to stay within your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession. I can sell the product to you for $84. It's a great price, and I think you'll really appreciate the value it brings.
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still a bit above my target budget. Would you be willing to go down to $80?
